Contact the Development Team

If you have a question about ImageMagick or a bug report, post to the discourse server, cafe, or the mailing list. We accept bug reports and patches here as well as ImageMagick license and security-related issues and questions about sponsoring the ImageMagick project. We are not interested in link-exchange programs or other similar solicitations. 95% of the messages posted here go unanswered because they are basic ImageMagick questions or problems better suited for the discourse-server or mailing list.

Enter this code, 04e2e0, in the Authenticate field and fill in the remaining fields. Press Send to forward your message to the ImageMagick wizards.
